attributes.action: Mrs May, rethink this transitional period of 2 years, we voted to leave the E.U.
attributes.background: We voted to leave the E.U and the single market, we are not stupid and we know what we voted for. We see the 'transitional period' as a weak stance that only prolongs the uncertainty and inturn weakens the £. Show the same faith as we have in Britain and leave, as we voted to do, do not betray us.
